Subject: Unable to authenticate to Azure
Description:
Running PingCastle against the Azure tenant results in a blank authentication dialog in interactive mode, leading to a failure.

Troubleshooting Steps Taken:

Attempted interactive mode: Authentication dialog appears blank and eventually fails.
Tried command-line mode with TenantID specified: Still triggers interactive mode, resulting in the same blank authentication dialog (PingCastle Cloud title).
What_We_Know__c: The application uses the proxy configured in the Internet Settings within the Control Panel.
Next_Steps__c: awaiting customer to confirm editing settings
Solution_Comment__c: The application uses the proxy configured in the Internet Settings within the Control Panel.
